snippet.title: The Assembly | PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on the Steam Store or Oculus Home for $29.99 / €24.99 / £19.99:
• http://steamcommunity.com/app/373650
• https://www2.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1268071846552963

The Assembly is AVAILABLE NOW on Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and Steam! The Assembly is a first-person interactive story, designed from the ground up for virtual reality headsets. Explore a morally ambiguous organisation and discover its mysteries from two contrasting perspectives, where tough decisions culminate in one of multiple thrilling conclusions. Face trials, solve problems, and ask yourself: Where will you draw the line? 

The Assembly will be coming to PlayStation VR later this year.
 
• Website: http://www.ndreams.com/theassembly
• Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/theassemblyvr
• Twitter: http://twitter.com/nDreamsVR #TheAssemblyVR
• Pinterest: http://www.pinterest.com/nDreamsVR/theassembly
• Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/ndreams/
